    • Constructor Detail

      • TouchHandler

        public TouchHandler(android.content.Context context,
                    float xInPoints,
                    float yInPoints,
                    boolean movable,
                    boolean buttonInputUp)
        Constructor for Touch Handler that runs right methods based on parameters
        Parameters:
        context - a reference to current state of object
        xInPoints - a reference to place of user click on x axis
        yInPoints - a reference to place of user click on x axis
        movable - a reference to boolean if the object is able to move on a screen
        buttonInputUp - a reference to boolean if the object is activated if user takes the finger back
